name: The Next King
description:
The Next King will be born, but you must get him to his crown and as the current King it is your duty. Take care not to crack his delicate shell as you overcome obstacles.  Toss him over hurdles, carry him to safety, and do it all without worrying about yourself. Take care of The Next King!

Done For Extra Credits Gamer Jam #6

Everything except the Audio was made by us. Audio Credits in Sound Assets File.
